level.introtext: Loops will modify variables repeatedly. Can you keep track?
level.endtext: Nice work! You're doing great with the loops!
level.code:
text = "hello" Loops always run multiple times no matter what you do! Loops only run while the condition is true, which may mean they never run! for i in range(0): text += "c"
for i in range(1,5): text += i
print(text)
sum = 0 for i in range(5,21,5): sum += i
print(sum)
